articles.title: Trump Administration Faces Backlash Over Policies and Appointments
articles.description: The U.S. domestic news focus on controversies surrounding President Trump's actions. articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Trump Blames FAA Diversity Push for Deadly Air Crash
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump controversially suggested that the FAA's diversity initiatives were responsible for a tragic midair collision near Washington. His comments sparked backlash from aviation experts, disability advocates, and politicians. The investigation into the crash, which resulted in no survivors, is ongoing with no link to DEI efforts established.
